text: "Soda music" privacy policy concise version

Beijing Micro-Broadcasting Vision Technology Co., Ltd. and its related parties (referred to as "we"), as operators of the "Douyin Music Edition-Soda Music", know the importance of personal information to you. We will protect you in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations to protectYour personal information and privacy security.
This concise guidance will help you intuitively and concisely understand how we collect, process personal information, and protect your privacy.
For more details, please read the complete "Soda Music Privacy Policy".
1. How do we collect and use information
1.1 contact method
· [User login] You need to use the registered Douyin account to log in.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You need to log in with a registered Douyin account.

text: · [Contact you] Your mobile phone number may be used to send you information such as operations, promotion, activities and other information, or contact you to handle investigations and interviews, complaint feedback, etc. with you.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Your mobile phone number may be used to send information such as operation, promotion, and activities to you.

text: · [Special Instructions] If you don't want to receive information such as operation, promotion, activities, you can copy the binding according to the specified method in the SMS.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: If you do not want to receive information such as operation, promotion, activities, you can unsubscribe bips in the specified method in the SMS.

text: 1.2 Account Information

·, [Account Information Synchronization] The basic information related to the Douyin account used by you log in to the "Soda Music" app will be displayed simultaneously in the "Soda Music" app (such as jitter, avatar, nickname, gender, birthday, regional and personal introductionwait).
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Usage
rewrite: The basic information related to the Douyin account used in the "Soda Music" app will be displayed simultaneously in the "Soda Music" APP.

text: 1.3 Equipment, service information
· [Equipment information and log information] In the process of software and services safely, we will collect your equipment information and log information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In the process of software and services, we will collect your equipment information and log information.

text: Equipment information refers to the performance related to equipment models, network identification, network access information, and equipment sensor information.Input privacy information;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: Log information refers to the service log generated during your service.
· [Special Instructions] Equipment and log information are also usually used in anti -cheating and judging whether the account is in a safe environment.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Equipment and log information are also usually used in anti -cheating and judging whether the account is in a safe environment.

text: Some information may also be used for advertising push.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Some information may also be used for advertising push.

text: At present, most mobile phone systems can support changes to the equipment identifier. For specific methods, please refer to the device or manufacturer's description.
1.4 shear plate

·, [Share, recognition] In the case of your sharing or receiving information, participation in activities, we need to access your shear board and read the passwords, sharing code, and links contained in it to achieve jumping, sharing, sharing, Activity linkage and other functions or services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: · [Statistical Analysis] We may need to statistics through the shear of the source channels of the application. In the statistical process, we will not transmit your personal privacy information of the shear plate.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We may need to statistics through the shear of the source channels of the application. In the statistical process, we will not return you to the personal privacy information of the shear plate.

text: · [Special Instructions] Systems of some mobile phones and other terminal devices will prompt the application (APP) to read the shear plate, but the system prompts that it cannot distinguish whether the shear information is collected and the error is not ruled out.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Risk
rewrite: Some mobile phones and other terminal devices will prompt the application (APP) to read the shear plate, but the system prompts that it cannot distinguish whether to collect shear information and do not rule out the error alarm.

text: Therefore, if you find a similar prompt, please contact us so that we can locate the problem.
1.5 Use information

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use it, we will record your clicks, comments, attention, praise, collection, search, search, play, sharing and other behaviors.

Important

label: Edit/Control
Important

text: · When there is no content you are interested in, you can also enter the keywords interested in the search bar, click and read the search results.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: When there is no content you are interested in, you can also enter the keywords interested in the search bar, click and read the search results.

text: 3.3 Logging out account
label: Edit/Control

text: · You can log out of the Douyin account you used.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can cancel the Douyin account you used.

text: After cancellation, we will delete relevant information about you. If the personal information is difficult to achieve technically, we will conduct anonymous treatment, or stop the treatment except for storage and take necessary security measures.Except for regulations.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: After cancellation, we will delete relevant information about you. If it is difficult to achieve technically, it will be anonymous, or stop the processing other than storage and take necessary safety protection measures, except for other regulations.

text: The full version of "Soda Music" privacy policy
Modification Date: June 08, 2022

text: You are welcome to use the official "Douyin Music Edition-Soda Music" (hereinafter referred to as "Soda Music") software and related services!

"Soda Music" refers to the client application of Beijing Micro -Broadcasting Vision Technology Co., Ltd. and its related parties (hereinafter referred to as "we") that is legally owned and operated."functional module.

As operators of soda music, we know the importance of personal information to you. We will protect your personal information and privacy security in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations.
We formulate this privacy policy and special reminders: I hope you read and understand the privacy policy carefully before using soda music and related services to make appropriate choices.
overview
We will introduce you how we handle personal information in different scenarios through this privacy policy.
When you turn on or use soda music, we will handle relevant information in order to realize the functions, services you choose to use, or to comply with laws and regulations.

Except for the basic functions of soda music, the information required for services, and the information necessary for laws and regulations, you can refuse us to process other information, but this may cause us to not provide corresponding functions and services.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: In addition to the information required for basic functions, services and the required information, you can refuse us to process other information, but this may cause us to not provide corresponding functions and services.

text: We will explain the relevant situation in the privacy policy. The important terms of your personal information rights and interests have been prompted in a bold form. Please pay special attention.

In addition to this privacy policy, in specific scenarios, we will also explain the corresponding information collection purposes, scope and usage methods through instant notifications (including pop -up windows, page prompts, etc.), functional update instructions, etc. These instant notifications will be notified in real time.And functional renewal instructions, such as part of the composition privacy policy, have the same effect as this privacy policy.

text: The following will help you understand how we collect, use, store, transmit, open and protect personal information;

We are committed to providing you with a safe, credible product and use environment, and providing high -quality and reliable services and information is our core goal.

text: 4 How do we protect the security of personal information
label: Data Security

text: We attach great importance to your personal information security, and we will strive to take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information, ensure that our personal information processing activities meet the requirements of laws, administrative regulations or other systems that can be applied in accordance with the law, and prevent unauthorized unauthorizedVisits and personal information leakage, tampering, and loss.
label: Data Security

text: 4.1 Security technical measures
label: Data Security

text: We will use the encryption, de -identification technology, anonymous processing, and related reasonable and feasible methods that are not lower than the general level of the industry to protect your personal information, and use a security protection mechanism to prevent your personal information from being maliciously attacked.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will use encryption, de -identification technology, anonymous treatment, and related reasonable and feasible means to protect your personal information, and use a security protection mechanism to prevent your personal information from being maliciously attacked.

text: 4.2 Management System
label: Data Security

text: We will establish a special security department, security management system, and data security process to ensure your personal information security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will establish a special security department, security management system, and data security process to ensure your personal information security.

text: We adopt strict data use and access system to ensure that only authorized personnel can access your personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We adopt strict data use and access system to ensure that only authorized personnel can access your personal information.

text: We will regularly conduct security education and training on personnel, and conduct security audit on data and technology in a timely manner.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will regularly conduct security education and training on personnel, and conduct security audit on data and technology in a timely manner.

text: We will formulate and organize the implementation of the emergency plan of personal information security incidents, and immediately start the emergency plan when the personal information security incident occurs, strive to control the impact of these security events, and prevent adverse consequences from expanding.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will develop and organize the implementation of the emergency plan for personal information security incidents, and immediately start the emergency plan when the personal information security incident occurs.

text: Once a personal information security incident (leak, tampering, and loss) may occur or may occur, we will tell you the following situations in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations: the types, reasons, and possible personal information, reasons and possibilities that may occur, may be tampered, and lost.The harm caused, the remedial measures we have taken, you can take the measures that reduce the harm and the way of contacting us.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Once a personal information security incident may occur, we will tell you the following situations in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations: the types, reasons, and hazards of personal information, remedial measures, and contact information to reduce harm.

text: We will promptly inform you of the incident -related situation with push notifications, emails, letters, text messages, and related forms. When it is difficult to inform them one by one, we will publish a reasonable and effective way.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will inform you in a timely manner that when it is difficult to inform one by one, we will publish a reasonable and effective way to publish an announcement.

text: At the same time, we will also report to the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the relevant regulatory authorities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will also report to the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the relevant regulatory authorities.

text: 4.3 Security reminder
label: Data Security

text: Although the above -mentioned reasonable and effective measures have been taken, and the standards of relevant laws and regulations have been adopted, please understand that due to the technical restrictions and various malicious means that may exist, in the Internet industry, even if you can do your best to strengthen your security measures, you can strengthen your security measures, and you can strengthen your security measures.It is also impossible to ensure that the information is 100 % security, and we will try our best to ensure the security of our personal information you provide.
label: Data Security

text: You know and understand that the system and communication network you use to access our services may be due to factors outside the control scope.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The systems and communication networks you use to connect to our services may have problems due to factors outside the controlled range.

text: Therefore, we strongly recommend that you take positive measures to protect the security of personal information, including but not limited to the use of complex passwords, regularly modify the password, do not disclose your account password and related personal information to others.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We strongly recommend that you take positive measures to protect the security of personal information, including but not limited to the use of complex passwords, regularly modify the password, do not disclose your account password and related personal information to others.

text: 8 Contact us
label: Contact Information

text: 8.1 Complaints and reports
label: Contact Information

text: If you think your personal information rights may be infringed, or you can find a clue to infringe the right to personal information, you can enter the user feedback interface to contact us in [I]-[Settings]-[Feedback of Opinions].Feedback your complaints and reports within 15 working days.

Contact Information
rewrite: You can contact us in [I]-[Settings]-[Feedback] to enter the user feedback interface. After we verify, we will report your complaints and reports within 15 working days.

text: If you think that the music on the soda music platform violates the legitimate rights and interests you enjoy, please follow the instructions below, please send emails to Music_copyright@bytedance.com for music copyright infringement complaints.
label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: Please send emails to Music_copyright@bytedance.com for music copyright infringement complaints.

text: 8.1.1 Identity proof of the right holder's identity materials and contact information
(1) The right holder as the complaint:

1. If it is a legal person or other organizations, the name of the legal person or other organization must be provided, the business license (including the official seal) or the qualification certification materials, the authorized attorney, effective contact information and address, and the effective complaint letter of the official sealItems
2. If you are an individual, you must provide name, personal ID scanning parts (including photo page), effective contact information and addresses;

3. If it is a minor, in principle, the guardian should be complained on behalf of them. The required materials should be refer to the following "entrusted agent complaints" and must provide proof of guardianship.
(2) The agent complained:

In addition to the subject certification materials required by the right holder, the agent must issue an agent's identity certificate (see the aforementioned content), and the authorized attorney of the agent (the authorization letter shall includeRelated content), and stamped the seal of the agent or signature.
8.1.2 Reasons for complaints

Please complete and accurately describe the content or objects you think of the rights (such as works, performances, or recording and video products) that you think are protected by copyright or related rights, and the objective facts and legal basis you think of infringing your rights.
8.1.3 Complaint request
(1) Please describe the specific matters of the request platform assistance (for example, removing or disconnecting the content link);
(2) Please provide the songs and singer names, network addresses and screenshots of the infringing content required to deal with.
8.1.4 Certificate of ownership:
Please provide proof of the ownership of the true and complete copyright of the complaint.
Prove to the ownership includes but not limited to:
-The copyright registration certificate (No.)
-The copyright certification document issued by the copyright certification agency or copyright collective management organization designated by the State Copyright Administrative Department
-The work manuscript
-Polties for the first public publishing or distribution date proof materials
-The contract to get rights
-D court effective ruling and judgment
-It other valid ownership materials that can prove that the right holder has relevant rights
The ownership certificate should provide the original or photocopy of the proof file in the form of an attachment.
Please make sure that the proved material reflects the right properties or validity period of rights you enjoy during the validity period of your rights.

8.1.5 Soda music can be required to supplement the submitting materials during the complaint processing process. You must answer or supplement within the reasonable period of notification of soda music. If the expiration of the period is not answered, it is deemed that you will withdraw the complaint and start from the beginning and from the beginningAbandon the claim of complaints.

8.1.6 After receiving the complaint notice that meets the requirements, we will accept it in accordance with the provisions of relevant laws and regulations. Please be sure to fill in the information in complete, accurate, and truly to improve the efficiency of the complaint.

For malicious complaints or wrong complaints, the complainant shall bear all legal responsibilities according to law, and if it causes losses to the platform, the platform reserves the right to investigate its legal responsibility.
If you are not sure if the relevant content violates your copyright and other legitimate rights and interests, it is recommended that you consult relevant professionals first.
8.2 Other problems
If you have questions or suggestions on personal information protection, you can choose to contact us through the following ways:
label: Contact Information
